data.name: DbContextTypeNotFound
data.value: Could not get the reflection type for DbContext : {0}

data.name: EFSqlServerPackageNotAvailable
data.value: Install the package 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer' and retry.

data.name: EnsureStartupClassExists
data.value: Make sure there is a Startup class and a ConfigureServices method and Configuration property in it.

data.name: FailedToCompileInMemory
data.value: Failed to compile the project in memory: {0}

data.name: FailedToEditStartup
data.value: Scaffolding failed to edit Startup class to register the new Context using Dependency Injection.

data.name: GeneratingDbContext
data.value: Generating a new DbContext class '{0}'

data.name: GettingEFMetadata
data.value: Attempting to figure out the EntityFramework metadata for the model and DbContext: '{0}'

data.name: ModelTypeCouldNotBeAdded
data.value: Could not add Model type '{0}' to DbContext '{1}'. Make sure that '{1}' has a DbSet property for '{0}'.

data.name: ModelTypeNotFound
data.value: Could not get the reflection type for Model : {0}

data.name: MySQLDbContextExceptionMssg
data.value: Unable to get DbContext Instance. Access denied for user (MySQL db).

data.name: NoEntityOfTypeInDbContext
data.value: There is no entity type {0} on DbContext {1}

data.name: PrimaryKeyNotFound
data.value: Primary key not found.

data.name: ScaffoldingNeedsToRerun
data.value: Scaffolding should be run again since it needs to reload the application with the added package reference - just run the previous command one more time.

data.name: StartupScaffoldingNotSupported
data.value: Startup.cs file was not found. Scaffolding is not supported for minimal hosting scenarios.

data.name: TemplateProcessingError
data.value: There was an error running the template {0}: {1}

data.name: TypeCastToDbContextFailed
